item.title: Playing With Power MTG (Official)
item.description: /c/Playing With Power MTG (Official) on discuss.online [home] [/c/playing_w_power_mtg ðŸŒŽ] [discuss.online] Description # Welcome Hey, welcome to the **Official Playing With Power MTG Lemmy community!** Glad to have you here! # Rules Rule 0: The Goose rule This rule encompasses all other areas deemed inappropriate for an MTG server, but aren't explicitly defined here. A rule may sometimes be hard to define, but you know the infraction when you see it.

item.title: To The Fediverse
item.description: /c/To The Fediverse on discuss.online [home] [/c/fediverse ðŸŒŽ] [discuss.online] Description # Welcome Let's talk about the [fediverse](https://www.fediverse.to/). The fediverse is a collection of community-owned, ad-free, decentralised, and privacy-centric social networks. Each fediverse instance is managed by a human admin. You can find fediverse instances dedicated to art, music, technology, culture, or politics. **Join the growing community and experience the web as it was meant to be.** Details Activity Count Subscribers 3 Posts 1 Comments 0 Daily Active Users 0 Weekly Active Users 0 Monthly Active Users 0 Activity Date Published 2023-06-15 16:54:58 Updated 1969-12-31 19:00:00 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:14

item.title: Lemmy Moderation Tools
item.description: /c/Lemmy Moderation Tools on discuss.online [home] [/c/lemmy_mod_tools ðŸŒŽ] [discuss.online] Description # Welcome I'm working on a moderation tool to work with Lemmy. I'm still in early development and discovery. This channel will update the status and respond to questions during development, testing, release, and post-release. item.title: BattleBit Remastered
item.description: /c/BattleBit Remastered on discuss.online [home] [/c/battlebit ðŸŒŽ] [discuss.online] Description Discussions regarding [BattleBit_Remastered](https://store.steampowered.com/app/671860/BattleBit_Remastered/). Early access is open, so sign up now! # Looking for a mod I created this community out of interest in the game. However, I'm not going to be able to manage it long-term. I'd love to hand off moderation to someone invested in this game. Details Activity Count Subscribers 2 Posts 5 Comments 0 Daily Active Users 0 Weekly Active Users 0 Monthly Active Users 0 Activity Date Published 2023-06-15 13:10:18 Updated 2023-06-16 04:20:48 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:14

item.title: Old people internet
item.description: /c/Old people internet on discuss.online [home] [/c/chainmail ðŸŒŽ] [discuss.online] Description # Welcome This is a great place to share the ridiculous things your in-laws or parents send you. We cannot help but ask ourselves why they think it's interesting. # Rules 1. Post must include who sent it to you. 2. Follow discuss.online code of conduct. 3. No porn! 4. Use the NFSW tag when something isn't appropriate for all audiences.
